ing: 1 (8 ounce) package shredded Monterey Jack cheese
des: "A plain and simple, yet delicious appetizing cheese ball.  If you choose, you may roll ball into chopped nuts of your choice. Serve with your favorite crackers."
ins: Combine the cream cheese, Cheddar cheese, Jack cheese, monosodium glutamate, Worcestershire sauce, ham and beef. Mix together well and form into ball. Refrigerate until chilled.
